sentences.english: Men who love wisdom should acquaint themselves with a great many particulars.
sentences.chinese: 喜爱智能的人应该让自己熟悉很多细微末节的小事。

sentences.english: Men who love wisdom should acquaint themselves with a great many particulars .
sentences.chinese: 喜爱智慧的人应该让自己熟悉很多细微末节的小事。
